availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James W. Turner (Morgan County, OH, farmer)

body.p: Morgan County, Ohio, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Sarah A. Turner. Father of Alonzo J. Turner, Thaddeus F. Turner, Clarence F. Turner, Felliston Turner, Marion B. Turner, Flora C. Turner, Sarah Turner, and James E. Turner. Farmer in Union, Ohio, in 1850. Farmer in Union in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Morgan County, Union, p. 206A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Morgan County, Union, p. 504.
"James W. Turner (1818-1878)," Find A Grave, Memorial #11476946, accessed September 7, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/11476946.
